name: LightFall
description: Hi, I'm a solo developer.  Lightfall is mostly a test of the Unreal Engine's HDRI, lighting, and particles capabilities that became a little first person shooter.  The line between architecture, design, and game development is blurring quite nicely with the Unreal Engine.   I saw  your contest on the Unreal Reddit page and thought it was a perfect match for the Epic Megajam.  It's not quite a finished game.  You just need to work your way to the tower and take the elevator up to a future level transition.  The game also works in VR with a gamepad controller.  You just need to bring up the console and launch it from there.  Take some time to admire the setting sun and dust swirling about the mysterious structures amidst the carnage.
